name: Everdream Forest
description:
Everdream Forest is a memory game where you invent fantastical dreams to connect together a string of random words.

In the NIGHT phase, plant seeds in the Dreamer’s mind to string together a wacky story of branching paths. In the DAY phase, remember what you dreamt to grow the seeds into a forest.

Made for Godot Wild Jam #55

Music by Ben Smith https://soundcloud.com/b3nsm1th — thanks Ben!! :)
